name: Redbird Aviation
about: Redbird Aviation is a premier institution dedicated to providing advanced flight training, particularly specializing in Single and Multi-Engine simulator training. Established with the mission of making aviation more accessible, Redbird Aviation offers immersive and realistic flight practice through its state-of-the-art simulators. The school is committed to helping aspiring pilots achieve their dreams, whether it be a gratifying career or a lifelong passion. With a strong focus on efficiency and realism, Redbird Aviation assists students in completing 100% of their Commercial Pilot License (CPL) flying and 99% of their DGCA ground classes. The school also offers specialized programs, including A320 Type Rating training, and collaborates with various aviation groups to enhance training curriculums and operational efficiency. Redbird Aviation is dedicated to producing highly skilled and dynamic young pilots, ensuring they are well-prepared for a rewarding career in aviation.
